analysis.key_quote: Reclassifying federal workers to enable firing for political reasons undermines the ability of the civil service to do its work and public confidence in the same.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the rule change, emphasizing concerns about politicization of the civil service and the erosion of due process protections for employees. It argues for reforming the existing process rather than dismantling it, which aligns with a defense of merit-based systems.
